subject: Badminton
lead_paragraph: Lee Chong Wei moved one win away from becoming the first Malaysian to win a world title by defeating the defending champion Chen Jin, 21-13, 21-9, in a semifinal at Wembley Arena in London.
snippet: Lee Chong Wei moved one win away from becoming the first Malaysian to win a world title by defeating the defending champion Chen Jin, 21-13, 21-9, in a semifinal at Wembley Arena in London.
